Title: Russian Forces Liberate Novogrodovka City in Donetsk - Defense Ministry
Description: MOSCOW (Sputnik) - Ministry of Defense reported on the progress of special military operation and on the key achievements of the Russian Armed Forces in the last 24 hours.

Title: Thousands of Brazilians Rally to Protest Against Blocking X

Title: Trump Jokingly 'Very Offended' by Putin's Endorsement of Harris

Title: Unmanned Flights to Mars Planned in 2 Years, Manned in 4 Years - Musk

Title: Turkiye's Ruling Party Points to EU's Double Standards in Fighting Russian Media

Title: Corporate Complicity in Censorship Destroys Due Process

The accused company was not named, but context clues revealed it is likely Tenet Media. In response, YouTube removed Tenet Media’s channel and alleged related channels.

Title: Scholz Expresses Confidence in His Re-Election in 2025 Despite Abysmal Polls
Description: BERLIN (Sputnik) - German Chancellor Olaf Scholz expressed confidence that the current coalition would last until the end of its term, and that he and his Social Democratic Party (SPD) would be re-elected in the next parliamentary elections in 2025.

Title: Half Million People Gather in Tel Aviv for Rally in Support of Gaza Hostages - Organizers

Title: Russia to Establish Embassy in Dominican Republic – Gov't Decree
Description: MOSCOW (Sputnik) - Russia will establish an embassy in the Dominican Republic in the country's capital city of Santo Domingo upon the proposal of the Russian Foreign Ministry, according to the governmental decree signed by Russian Prime Minister Mikhail Mishustin on Saturday.

Title: Iranian President Calls to Move Capital to Persian Gulf Coast Closer to Major Trade Routes
Description: TEHRAN (Sputnik) - Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian said on Saturday that the country's political and economic center should be moved south, to the coast of the Persian Gulf closer to major trade routes.

Title: The US Needs Universal High Income
Description: Get a job!' That’s the clichéd response to panhandlers and anyone else who complains of being broke. But, what if you can’t?
